hints.content: On the number line, we start at $921$ and move **left** $\purpleD{200}$, then $\blueE{70}$, and finally $\maroonD{8}$ more.

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 643, 651, 721, and 921. A purple arrow labeled minus 200 is above the number line beginning at 921 and ending at 721. A blue arrow labeled minus 70 is above the number line beginning at 721 and ending at 651. A pink arrow labeled minus 8 is above the number line beginning at 651 and ending at 643. !
